MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY18 postcode area of Llanidloes, affecting properties in Pantmawr, Tylwch, Llangurig and surrounding area. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the overhead lines. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.10pm on 11th of Jan 2021
